00001 #include "Parser.h"

00010 #include "../core/LogManager.h"
00011 using namespace jvgs::core;
00012 
00013 #include "../math/Vector2D.h"
00014 using namespace jvgs::math;
00015 
00016 #include "../tinyxml/tinyxml.h"
00017 
00018 namespace jvgs
00019 {
00020     namespace sketch
00021     {
00022         /* Map filling. */
00023         map<string, SketchElementParser*> createSketchElementParsers()
00024         {
00025             map<string, SketchElementParser*> sketchElementParsers;
00026 
00027             static GroupParser groupParser;
00028             sketchElementParsers["g"] = &groupParser;
00029 
00030             static PathParser pathParser;
00031             sketchElementParsers["path"] = &pathParser;
00032 
00033             return sketchElementParsers;
00034         }
00035 
00036         /* Map implementation. */
00037         map<string, SketchElementParser*> Parser::sketchElementParsers = 
00038                 createSketchElementParsers();
00039 
00040         Parser::Parser(string fileName, Sketch *sketch)
00041         {
00042             document = new TiXmlDocument(fileName.c_str());
00043             if(!document->LoadFile()) {
00044                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00045                         "Could not load xml document: %s", fileName.c_str());
00046             }
00047 
00048             this->sketch = sketch;
00049         }
00050 
00051         Parser::~Parser()
00052         {
00053             delete document;
00054         }
00055 
00056         void Parser::parse()
00057         {
00058             TiXmlElement *rootElement = document->RootElement();
00059 
00060             float width, height;
00061             rootElement->QueryFloatAttribute("width", &width);
00062             rootElement->QueryFloatAttribute("height", &height);
00063             sketch->setSize(Vector2D(width, height));
00064 
00065             GroupParser *groupParser = new GroupParser();
00066 
00067             Group *root = (Group*) groupParser->parse(0, rootElement);
00068             sketch->setRoot(root);
00069             sketch->finnish();
00070 
00071             delete groupParser;
00072         }
00073 
00074         SketchElementParser *Parser::getSketchElementParser(const string &tag)
00075         {
00076             map<string, SketchElementParser*>::iterator iterator =
00077                     sketchElementParsers.find(tag);
00078             if (iterator != sketchElementParsers.end())
00079                 return iterator->second;
00080             else
00081                 return 0;
00082         }
00083     };
00084 };
